item.title: Reasonable Treks And Tour
item.description:
Reasonable Treks and Tour is local base holiday operator Reasonable Treks and Tour team ensures a complete holiday experience to suit requirements of an individual or a group and fulfills yours dream of climbing, walking, hiking,trekking in the great Himalayas of Nepal & Tibet. We are a pioneer Nepal’s government registered trekking agency based in Kathmandu. The only paradise lies in the world is Nepal. To the adventures lovers, Trekking in Nepal is an experience of many proportion.
We offer the best and most personalized travel services. When you come with us, all services are included, leaving you free to enjoy the beauty around you and respond to the warmth of people who have not forgotten to maintain the integrity of our natural environment. Relax and give yourself time to enjoy a unique holiday with us. We do not force you follow our day to day pre-planned itinerary; it can be minimized as well as prolong on your requirements. This trekking agency in Nepalcan arrange the trip in any period of time. The only thing you need to do is choose a plan we will do the work of organizing that perfectly matches with your holiday plan.

item.title: Nepal Planet Treks expedition
item.description: Nepal Planet Treks & Expeditions welcomes you to Nepal the country of the Himalayas, started in 2014 Nepal Planet Treks & Expeditions is one the new and innovated agencies in Nepal. Our Managing Director/Trekking Guide Mr. Sanjib Adhikari has over 18 years of trekking experience and always looks for the newest and unexplored routes to increase your trekking experience. Offering all activities such as; trekking, touring, mountaineering, adventure sports, volunteering, paragliding, jungle safaris, mountain flights and many more Nepal Planet Treks & Expeditions promises you a lifetime of memories on a single trip! Nepal Planet Treks & Expeditions offers the newest way of trekking by letting our guests modify the routes to just explore a bit further in to the beautiful landscape of Nepal. Dealing in sustainable tourism we provide jobs for the local communities by hiring porters directly from the local villages, booking at the local teahouses provides a sustainable income for the rural areas in Nepal. Our Nepal Mountain Guide Team provides you with the best service so that you as our valued guest can enjoy the utmost of your well-deserved holiday/trek. In our team

item.title: Everest base camp trekking
item.description: Everest Base Camp trekking is one of the classical and popular trekking trail that started in 1953 from Nepal side. Generally, trekkers love two weeks trek starting and concluding at Lukla, the airport at the south of Sagarmatha National Park. However, alternativey you may start from Jiri spending extra ten days before Phakding. The trail continues via upper Phakding and it follows the Dudh Kosi valley that climbs up to the Sherpa capital of Namche Bazzar which is the junction for every trekker to the Everest region. Villages and magnificent rhododendron, magnolia and giant fire forests are intermingled in the region. Enroute, you will pass through Thyangboche monastery, Pangboche and Pheriche villages, rich in Sherpa culture and traditions. The trail follows Khumbu Glacier upto Lobuche, a best point to view the scene of Ama Dablam, Tawache and other peaks then trail leads Gorak Shep. Mount Kala pattar(5554m) is the final destination of this trek which offers the breathtaking views of Himalayan giant, literally, freezing your senses with breathless admiration that beholds the eye; and makes up for the lung stuffed climb that took you up to there.
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Enjoy Nepal Treks Expedition & Tours P.Ltd.
item.description: Dear Nepal Travelers Namaste! My name is Ras Bahadur rai from the east part of Nepal Everest Region(Solukhumbu).I have an experience in tourism since 2008.I am a Government licensed Trekking Guide in Nepal. As well owner at Enjoy Nepal Treks Expedition & Tours Pvt.Ltd. www.enjoynepaltreks.com I have been all part of Nepal in Nepal Trekking Himalayas Regions and Routes as porter ,Cook and Guide.(Everest Region,Annapurna Region,Mustang Region,Manaslu Region,Dolpo Region,Kanchenjunga ,Langtang Region,Arun Valley, all most all trekking region in Nepal. If you like to ask about the Nepal,Nepal Trekking,Peak Climbing ,Guide, Porter if you like to Nepal Trek with me, write me E-mail at any time.It's me available for all Nepal Trekking Regions and Trekking season.Thanks! Guide license: 6204 Guide Experience: 8 Years (agency employed) Nationality: Nepali Language speak: English & Germany

item.description: It is my great pleasure to introduce our self as a tour, trekking & expedition operator in Nepal, Tibet, Bhutan, & India. We are eagerly welcome you at our great country of Himalayan Ranges of Nepal. The company has dedicated, dynamic travel expert since its establishment. Our team will be right hand in your tour & trekking packages as well as other services. Limitless Vacation Pvt. Ltd. Operates Muktinath yatra, Kailash yatra, Pashupatianth Yatra, cultural tours, special interest tours, adventure tours and trekking along with meetings, incentives, conferences, hotel bookings, domestic and international ticketing. All tours can be tailor made to meet our client's specific requirements. The company in essence provides complete destination management for our varied clientele. The office of Limitless Vacation Pvt. Ltd is very centrally located in the business and tourist hub of the city at Soalteemod. We assure our clients the best possible services that can be provided in Nepal due to our experience, expertise and infrastructure. Looking forward to welcome you in the land of the Himalayan kingdom of Nepal.

item.title: Upper Mustang Trek
item.description: Upper Mustang Trek is a standout amongst the most interesting encounters that you can have in Nepal. Culture and way of life of individuals Upper Mustang or Lo Manthang take after to that of Tibet and the territory is home to antiquated expressions and religious communities going back to numerous hundreds of years.Trek to the current region is thru unproductive, nearly untimbered landscapes, sturdy winds typically scream across the world in the afternoon, generally, quiet down at the hours of darkness. Being within the area space of mountain range has less downfall than the remaining components of Kingdom of Nepal.

item.title: Asian Journey Pvt Ltd
item.description:
Asian Journeys Pvt Ltd – is a privately owned adventure outfitting company that specializes in providing our clients with high-level experiences in the Himalayas. Founded in Nepal in 2003 we have more than 12 years of experience in providing our clients with life long memories of Trekking in the Himalayas. We from the depth of heart would like to provide a comfort with thrilling adventures to our clients and also some of the notable qualities to provide to you are:
We offer outdoor adventure trips into three very different cultures that include Nepal, Bhutan and Tibet. We provide you with trips that include peak climbing, mountaineering, rafting, mountain biking as well as wildlife safaris. also providing cultural toursas well. We will be happy to develop a custom tour that will meet all of the requests of our clients. We can mix or match activities as needed to exceed your expectations during your time with our friendly and experienced guides. We can also address any special physical or dining requirements. Think of us when planning your honeymoon, or photography adventures. Our team is a group of experts who have academic and technical expertise in the tourism industry and our company has got a collective experience of more than a decade. Our loyal, committed and experienced staff gives us the edge over our competition. Our motto “Safety, comfort and standard service in the price you can afford” reflects the wide range of services we provide to our valued customers.
Our Tour leaders and guide who are a specialist in religion, culture, and tradition in this region has helped a lot to establish our company as the leading trek organizers in the region in a short span of time.
We are committed to provide personalized services to our clients even before they leave home and until they are back home sound and safe. Our team provides sound knowledge of health issues, trek preparations, visa and other frontier formalities and other many issues related to travelling.
If you have a passion for travel and want to experience the ultimate adventure in Himalayan region (Nepal, Tibet, Bhutan & India), then you can entrust us. With the better understanding of your desire to visit new places and come home with a real sense of satisfaction, we have the potential to turn your dream adventure trip into a reality while taking care of your interest.

item.title: Annapurna Base Camp Trek
item.description: Annapurna Base Camp Trek or first rudiment trek is thus notable trekking destination around trekkers. whereas you complete Annapurna Base camp trek you may step to end one,475,890 Stairs. we'll begin the trek with less crowed and natural scenic half Khoramukh. The Annapurna Base Camp Trek offers a chance to induce too high Himalayan altitudes wherever glaciers replace rivers. One should ascend the foothills from Pokhara, appreciating the slate-roofed tropical villages and luxurious bush forests, gorges, etc., and once we climb higher, we are going to get to the hidden world of the Annapurna Sanctuary.

item.title: Duke Nepal
item.description:
Duke Nepal Adventure is the best operator of Ghandruk trekking package as our package is economic & enjoyable too & it is the easiest trek of Nepal. Join us
Ghorepani Poonhill Trekking Ghorepani Poonhill Trekking;An Easy Trek
Ghorepani Poonhill Trekking is a popular trekking route among Nepalese and foreigners too. It is a short and easy adventure around Annapurna region where any individual can have once in a lifetime memories. Stunning Sunrise view , the panorama of Himalayas, natural and cultural importance of place makes this trek extra beautiful. Poonhill view point offers rich view of Annapurna, Dhaulagiri, Nilgiri, Himchuli, Machhapuchre and other Himalaya peaks. Gurungs and Magars are local inhabitants of Ghorepani and this place also offers cultural insight of these communities.

item.title: Nepal Base Camp Treks Pvt. Ltd.
item.description: For over a decade now, Nepal Base Camp Treks have been the preferred choice for trekking enthusiasts, hiking the entirety of Nepal’s stunning Himalayas. Operated by highly experienced trek planners, the company has been guiding trekkers through one of the most beautiful mountain terrains in the world. But it’s not just trekking in Nepal that the company has expertise in; it also arranges yoga, slide shows, cultural tours, short hiking, bird watching, etc. Treks we arrange • Annapurna region trekking • Langtang region trekking • Wilderness trekking • Everest region trekking • Ghale Gaun trek • Mardi Himal trek Tours we arrange • Chitwan jungle safari • Kathmandu Nagarkot Dhulikhel tour • Helicopter tour in Nepal • Nepal Widlife Safari • Mountain flight in Nepal • Mountain Biking in Nepal • Paragliding in Nepal Mission Our mission has always been to give you an amazing cultural experience which is filled with culturally enriching adventures in Everest base camp trekking. Not just in Nepal, but we also operate treks and tours in India, Tibet and Bhutan. We understand the fact that you work hard all year to make your dream travel a reality and the fact that you want to travel with a purpose. Precisely for this reason, we go the extra mile in ensuring that your trip is meaningful. Through excellent services, we aim to offer you value for money trip packages at best prices.
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Sujan Sitaula
item.description: Beside the Himalayan Treks and Expedition is an well equipped, trustworthy and highly experienced trekking and tour agency in Nepal, authorized by Nepal Government with all local crews. We specealize for Trekking in Nepal, Nepal Adventure Holidays and other exciting outdoor activities. Our Trekking Company has been launched by a professional and energetic team after gaining deep knowledge and more than a decade blend experience in tourism industry. Our professional management, expert guides, familiar staffs are the sources for Himalayan fun and adventure. We proudly as well as perfectly organize exciting treks, classic and scenic tour, peak climbing, rafting, jungle safari, expedition, paragliding, bungee jump, mountain flight, hiking, sightseeing and other adventurous activities with best price and excellent service guarantee to make your vacation lifetime unforgettable. Our service is extended to Bhutan and Tibet as well. We are an excellent service provider in any outdoor activities either directly touched our valued clients or through our partnership agencies throughout the world. We are also extending our service coordinating with agencies and related travel crews. We are very satisfied from our every client after the response of our every program and till now we never heard even one weak points of our company, of our management and of our staffs. We have succeeded to print our organized activities in their mind as lifetime memorable, which is our goal.
